title: A Sacrifice of Dragons
description: February, 1944...the invasion of the Philippines. The Marine Assault on Luzon and the Army assault on Leyte are guarded by two great US Navy task forces.The Japanese have changed their tactics, but have they changed their strategy?Destroyer Squadron 26, The Dragons, are in the San Bernadino Strait. History is about to repeat itself, and Captain Samantha Hunt knows it.The Yamato is out there. The Musashi is out there. The two greatest battleships ever built are out there.Hunt and her squadron are alone. They must hold.Will it be a sacrifice of dragons?
author: M.L. Maki
